summary: This is an email dated July 8, 2019, providing a status update on Jeffrey Epstein, stating he pled not guilty and is being detained pending a bail hearing scheduled for that Thursday. The email originates from an FBI New York office squad focused on Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email; he has pled not guilty and is being detained pending a bail hearing.

events.title: Epstein Pleads Not Guilty
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein pled not guilty to charges and is being detained.

events.title: Scheduled Bail Hearing
events.description: A bail hearing for Jeffrey Epstein is scheduled for Thursday, July 11, 2019.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein pled not guilty to charges as of July 8, 2019.
Epstein was being detained pending a bail hearing scheduled for Thursday, July 11, 2019.
The status update email originated from the FBI New York office, specifically SSA - Squad C-20, which handles Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking.
